message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm sure you'll find our price of $1150000 quite reasonable.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000.
Hi Bob, thanks for getting back to me. While I can't accept your offer of $1000000, I'm willing to lower my initial price to reflect our negotiations. I'm now offering the product at $1100000.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I would like to offer $1050000 for the product.
